articles.title: Internet Evolution
articles.text: An overview of Panama’s internet journey from dial-up to 5G. Explore major milestones, broadband expansion, and government policy shaping connectivity from 2001 to 2024.

articles.title: Digital Backbone
articles.alt: Telecommunication towers and Panama City skyline
articles.text: Understand how Panama built its digital backbone: submarine cables, broadband growth, mobile internet, and the evolution of ISPs and mobile operators through competition and mergers.

articles.title: Connecting All
articles.alt: Students using computers in a rural school in Panama
articles.text: Discover Panama’s public access programs—Infoplazas, Internet Para Todos, AIG—and digital policies that improved access for underserved communities from 2004 to 2030.

articles.title: Digital Growth
articles.alt: Smart city visual with digital icons over Panama City
articles.text: See how e-commerce, fintech, and digital entrepreneurship reshaped Panama’s economy. Includes fintech apps, Startup Panama, and growth trends from 2018 to 2024 and beyond.
